issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Remove collect from merge
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The merge currently uses a collect within the thread, which causes the accumulation to happen before merging all batches together, see <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8473/files#r506304982>
